#include <stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>

int compare(int* a,int* b)
{
    return(*b-*a);
}

int main()
{
    int t,n,i,index;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        int a[n],freq[501]={0},max=0;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d",&a[i]);
            freq[a[i]]++;
        }
        qsort(a,n,sizeof(int),compare);
    
        for(i=500;i>0;i--)
        {
            if(freq[i]>max)
            {
                max=freq[i];
                index=i;
            }
        }
        printf("%d %d\n",index,max);
    }
    
    return 0;
}
